Description: Target is healed of d10 concussion hits.
Allows caster to stop bleeding on a wound that is bleeding 1 hit per round. Target may not be moved, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.
Target is healed of one area of mild frostbite or first degree burn.
Allows caster to mend one simple fracture (not compound fractures, shatters, joint damage, etc.). Recovery time is one day.
As Healing I, except heals 3d10 concussion hits.
Target is relieved of one roundâ€™s worth of accumulated stun. See Section 7.1.1 for more information.
As Minor Fracture Repair, except that the caster can also repair compound fractures. Recovery time is one day.
For the duration of this spell, the target gets an additional RR versus any disease(s).
For the duration of this spell, the target gets an additional RR versus any poison(s).
Allows caster to completely mend a damaged minor blood vessel (a vessel that bleeds at up to 2 hits per round, not major arteries or veins).
As Healing I, except heals 5d10 concussion hits.
Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged muscle or tendon. Recovery time is 1 hour.
As Frost/Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 3 areas of mild damage or 1 area of severe damage (e.g., third degree burns) or a combination of 1 mild and 1 moderate area of damage.
As Stun Relief I, except relieves 2 rounds of stun.
Caster can cure any one paralyis problem.
As Healing I, except heals 10d10 concussion hits.
As Frost Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 4 mild or 2 moderate or 1 mild and 1 severe or 2 mild and 1 moderate areas of damage.
Caster can remove any one disease from the target.
Caster can remove any one poison from the target.
As Stun Relief I, except relieves all rounds of stun.
As Healing I, except heals 15d10 concussion hits.
As Healing I, except heals all concussion damage.
Caster can use any lower level spell on this list once per round.
